forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 64F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early with mainly sunny skies later in the day as drier air moves in on gusty breezes. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low around 5C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 41F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High near 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
